original_text: You must offer those gifts every day for seven days. They are the food of an offering by fire. The smell of them as they burn will make the Lord happy. But you must still give the regular burnt offering with the proper drink offering.
korean_text: 너희는 이 순서대로 이레 동안 매일 여호와께 향기로운 화제의 음식을 드리되 상번제와 그 전제 외에 드릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: You must offer those gifts every day
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 매일 그 선물들을 바쳐야 한다

sentences.original_text: They are the food of an offering by fire
The smell of them as they burn
But you must still give the regular burnt offering
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 여전히 항상 드리는 번제를 바쳐야 한다
